comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of phones to stock and y be the number of laptops to stock. Both x and y are non-negative integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "1*x + 4*y \leq 400 (Floor space constraint)",
        "y \geq 0.8*(x+y) (At least 80% of all appliances in stock be laptops)",
        "400*x + 100*y \leq 6000 (Cost constraint)",
        "x >= 0 (Non-negativity constraint for phones)",
        "y >= 0 (Non-negativity constraint for laptops)"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 120*x + 40*y (Profit)"
}
